description:
In today's Daily Fix:
We’ve got some more rumors about the hardware specs for Nintendo’s Switch successor, Skull & Bones is getting an open beta before it sets sail next month, and Tifa Lockhart stans are so thirsty for her to show up in Tekken 8, the series producer had to address it.

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo
title: Switch 2's Screen Will Be a Grower, Not a Shower - IGN Daily Fix
Dev Patel is directing AND starring in Monkey Man. Thank Jordan Peele for putting this in THEATERS.

description:
Much has been made of Palworld's Pal designs bearing a striking resemblance to certain Pokémon, so IGN's resident Pokémaniac Joshua Yehl went through and made a comparison of each one. Does Boltmane look like a Shiny Luxray? Does Verdash look like a green Cinderace? Take a look at this Palworld/Pokémon comparison and decide for yourself.

#IGN #Gaming #Palworld
title: Palworld vs. Pokémon Comparison: Just How Similar Are the Designs?

description:
After a month's worth of content, hear Mitchell's own personal impressions based on 10 hours of gameplay of Dragon's Dogma 2 in our full preview. Find out what we thought about exploration, combat, the vocations, the new take on sidequests, and much more.

#IGN #Gaming #DragonsDogma2
title: Dragon's Dogma 2 Preview - Our Thoughts After 10 Hours of Gameplay

description:
Palworld is supposed to be the "Pokemon with guns" game, right? But as you play, you'll notice that actual weaponry is fairly tough to come by in the early game. Luckily, well before you're able to get yourself a gun, your Pals can be geared up with special abilities that allow them to use a variety of guns. So if you're looking to use guns right away in Palworld, this video will show you which Pals to catch, what gear to make, and what level you need to be to make it!

#IGN #Gaming #Palworld
title: Palworld: Best Pal Weapons You Can Get Early

description:
Orion seems a lot like your average elementary school kid – shy, unassuming, harboring a secret crush. But underneath his seemingly normal exterior, Orion is a ball of adolescent anxiety, completely consumed by irrational fears of bees, dogs, the ocean, cell phone waves, murderous gutter clowns, and even falling off of a cliff. But of all his fears, the thing he’s the most afraid of is what he confronts on a nightly basis: the dark.

So when the literal embodiment of his worst fear pays a visit, Dark whisks Orion away on a roller coaster ride around the world to prove there is nothing to be afraid of in the night. As the unlikely pair grows closer, Orion must decide if he can learn to accept the unknown – to stop letting fear control his life and finally embrace the joy of living.

The stellar voice cast includes Jacob Tremblay as “Orion,” Paul Walter Hauser as “Dark,” Werner Herzog as “Narrator,” Angela Bassett as “Dreams,” Colin Hanks as “Adult Orion,” Mia Akemi Brown as “H
title: Orion and The Dark - Official Exclusive Clip (2024) Paul Walter Hauser, Angela Bassett

description:
One small ember can burn down everything. Check out the red band Monkey Man trailer for the upcoming action thriller movie starring Dev Patel, Sharlto Copley (District 9), Sobhita Dhulipala (Made in Heaven), Pitobash (Million Dollar Arm), Vipin Sharma (Hotel Mumbai), Ashwini Kalsekar (Ek Tha Hero), Adithi Kalkunte (Hotel Mumbai), Sikandar Kher (Aarya) and Makarand Deshpande (RRR).

Oscar nominee Dev Patel (Lion, Slumdog Millionaire) achieves an astonishing, tour-de-force feature directing debut with an action thriller about one man’s quest for vengeance against the corrupt leaders who murdered his mother and continue to systemically victimize the poor and powerless.

Inspired by the legend of Hanuman, an icon embodying strength and courage, Monkey Man stars Patel as Kid, an anonymous young man who ekes out a meager living in an underground fight club where, night after night, wearing a gorilla mask, he is beaten bloody by more popular fighters for cash.

After years of suppre
title: Monkey Man - Official Red Band Trailer (2024) Dev Patel, Jordan Peele

description:
Meet Highwater, a new adventure game featuring a turn-based puzzle combat system set in a flooded region outside of the dry land of Alphaville where the wealthy have literally walled themselves in. You'll make friends, laugh a little, and ultimately try to escape to Mars as life on Earth becomes increasingly unsustainable. Highwater is in development at Demagog Studio and publisher Rogue Games for PC, PlayStation, Xbox, and Nintendo Switch.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Highwater: Official Announcement Trailer

description:
Watch this exclusive BioGun: Clinical Trial trailer for a look at the prologue for the upcoming metroidvania game, BioGun. 

Prepare to squeeze into a tiny vaccine and embark on a mission to save your beloved pup and all of dogkind from a deadly virus. BioGun draws inspiration from the late 90s with a hand-drawn vibrant art style that's reminiscent of old childhood cartoons. Get a look at the game's bright, microscopic world in this new BioGun gameplay. Befriend various cells on your journey, absorb new powers from vanquished foes, and explore vital organs to prevent them from failing.

The BioGun: Clinical Trial prologue is available to play for free on PC via Steam now.

#Gaming #IGN #Games
title: BioGun: Clinical Trial - Exclusive Trailer

description:
Palworld is a massive hit that does enough to distance itself from Pokémon mechanically while also being a little too close for comfort to Pokémon artistically. Let’s dig into the controversy and figure out exactly what’s happening with Palworld.

#Palworld #Pokemon #Gaming
title: Palworld: Is It Fair to Call It a Pokemon Ripoff?

description:
Watch the Ricky Stanicky trailer for the upcoming R-rated comedy starring John Cena, Zac Efron, Jermaine Fowler, Andrew Santino, Lex Scott Davis, Anja Savcic, Jeff Ross, and William H. Macy.

Amazon MGM Studios’ Ricky Stanicky revolves around a childhood prank gone wrong and a decades-long lie that has gone too far. It is directed by Peter Farrelly with a screenplay by Jeff Bushell and Brian Jarvis & James Lee Freeman & Peter Farrelly & Pete Jones & Mike Cerrone.

When three childhood best friends pull a prank gone wrong, they invent the imaginary Ricky Stanicky to get them out of trouble! Twenty years after creating this ‘friend,’ Dean, JT, and Wes (Zac Efron, Andrew Santino, and Jermaine Fowler) still use the nonexistent Ricky as a handy alibi for their immature behavior. When their spouses and partners get suspicious and demand to finally meet the fabled Mr. Stanicky, the guilty trio decide to hire washed-up actor and raunchy celebrity impersonator "Rock Hard" Rod (John Ce
title: Ricky Stanicky - Official Trailer (2024) John Cena, Zac Efron

description:
Watch the new Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League trailer. Team up with Will Arnett, Ron Funches, and Director Jodi Hill and take on the impossible. See how it all goes down in this latest trailer for the upcoming third-person action-shooter game, Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League. Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, and PC on February 2, 2024.

#DC #Gaming #IGN
title: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League - Official Live Action Spot (ft. Will Arnett & Ron Funches)

description:
Dive into everything we know about Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League, the highly-anticipated game from Rocksteady Studios, the developers of the Batman: Arkham series. Find out what weapons and abilities Harley Quinn, Deadshot, King Shark, and Captain Boomerang will need to take down the likes of Batman, Green Lantern, The Flash, and Superman. Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League drops on February 2nd.

#ign #dc #gaming
title: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League - Everything We Know So Far
Have you found a shiny- I mean LUCKY Pal? Here’s what they are and how to find them! #palworld
This game is called Helskate, and it’s like Tony Hawk Pro Skater but with demons and combat! #gaming
In 2023, there were 10,000+ layoffs in the gaming industry. In 2024, we’ve had 5,600 layoffs so far.

description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Nintendo has finally issued a statement regarding mega-hit survival-crafting game, Palworld, a.k.a. "Pokémon with guns." Although the statement doesn't amount to a whole lot, Nintendo did mention that they will investigate any possible infringement on their IP, which includes Pokémon. In other news, Microsoft is the latest company to add more workers to the unempoyment line. The company has laid off nearly two thousand employees across their different divisions, including Activision Blizzard King. And finally, Horizon Forbidden West has a release date on PC.

#IGN #Gaming #Palworld
title: The Pokémon Company Will “Investigate” Palworld’s Similarities - IGN Daily Fix

description:

description:
Learn everything you need to know about Dondoko Island in Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth, including how to get a 5 Star Rating on your resort in our video guide. This Infinite Wealth Dondoko Island guide will walk you through your daily routine, how to increase your satisfaction and popularity rankings, where to find rare ore, and much more.

title: Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth - How to Get 5 Stars on Dondoko Island
